title: “We still have a situation where people genuinely do hate each other”—violence in Northern Ireland
summary:
Also on the daily podcast: Alexei Navalny’s prison tribulations and the “poetry slams” of eastern Congo“We still have a situation where people genuinely do hate each other”—violence in Northern IrelandTHE OSTENSIBLE reason for continuing clashes relates to a well-attended funeral.
But the terms of Brexit have raised tempers, inflaming centuries-old tensions; we ask what might calm them.
Alexei Navalny’s condition is worsening in prison: does it really serve the Kremlin’s interests to let him perish?
